overview: Andy Grove has more than 20 years experience as a software developer and has been developing in Java since its introduction. Prior to his role at CodeFutures, Andy gained extensive experience in developing advanced systems for major international banks, including Natwest Global Banking & Markets, SBC Warburg, and Mitsubishi Trust & Banking Corporation. Andy has worked as a product architect for SOA products in Cape Clear Software and Rogue Wave Software. CodeFutures is the second company that Andy has co-founded. Andy also co-founded and was Chief Technology Officer of Orbware, the first J2EE licensee in the UK, which went from start up to acquisition in just 11 months.
